parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "title": "Suspicious domain detected",
  "description": "This alert was generated automatically from the workflow.",
  "source": "n8n",
  "sourceRef": "{{ $json.domain }}-{{Date.now()}}",
  "type": "external",
  "severity": {{ $json["probability_DGA"] >= 0.8 ? 3 : $json["probability_DGA"] >= 0.7 ? 2 : 1 }},
  "tlp": {{ $json["probability_DGA"] >= 0.8 ? 3 : $json["probability_DGA"] >= 0.7 ? 2 : 1 }},
  "artifacts": [
    {
      "dataType": "domain",
      "data": "{{$json["domain"]}}",
      "message": "Domain classified as suspicious",
      "tlp": 2,
      "ioc": true,
      "tags": ["ml-dga"]
    }
  ]
}

nodes.name: whois enrichment for non dga detected domains
whois enrichment for  dga detected domains

values.content:
=You are a SOC analyst assistant.

Summarize the security context of the following domain indicator using all available data.
Focus only on actionable intelligence.
If a field is missing, state "Not available".

Include the following sections:

- Indicator
- Indicator Type
- Detection Source
- VirusTotal Verdict
- WHOIS Summary
- DNS Observations
- Risk Level
- Recommended Action

Context Data:
Indicator Type: Domain
Indicator Value: {{ $json.enrichment?.indicator || $json.domain || $json.artifacts?.[0]?.data }}

Detection Source:
- ML/DGA Classification (if present)
- VirusTotal Analyzer (if present)

VirusTotal Verdict:
{{ $json.report?.full?.verbose_msg || "No VirusTotal detection data" }}

WHOIS Summary:
Registrar: {{ $json.enrichment?.whois?.registrar || "Unknown" }}
Creation Date: {{ $json.enrichment?.whois?.creation_date || "Unknown" }}
Country: {{ $json.enrichment?.whois?.country || "Unknown" }}

DNS Observations:
A Records: {{ $json.enrichment?.dns?.A || "None" }}
NS Records: {{ $json.enrichment?.dns?.NS || "None" }}
MX Records: {{ $json.enrichment?.dns?.MX || "None" }}

Risk Level:
- Consider DGA likelihood
- Consider recent domain registration
- Consider lack of reputation data

Recommended Action:
- Monitoring, blocking, or investigation steps appropriate for a SOC

main.node: whois enrichment for non dga detected domains
whois enrichment for  dga detected domains
